services.title: Access Information
subservices: Access verified information about waste reduction.
Access verified information about circular economy.
Access verified information about resource recovery issues.
Access CIC research and publications.
Access the Resource Library.
Receive notifications for workshops, forums, and events.

services.title: Stay Informed
subservices: Email list about circular news and events from around the world.
Email list about policy and industry updates.
Email list about partner events.
Circular Innovation Council announcements and updates.

services.title: Multi-Sectoral Perspectives
subservices: Neutral-setting discussions about priority environmental issues.
Perspectives from governments, industry, SMEs, individuals, non-profits, and more.

services.title: Networking Forum
subservices: Connect with governments of all levels.
Connect with environmental non-profits.
Connect with environmental consultants and businesses.

services.title: Reduced Rates
subservices: Reduced rates for forums.
Reduced rates for workshops.
Reduced rates for seminars.
Reduced rates for CIC or partner special events.

services.title: Voting Privileges
subservices: Vote at the annual general meeting.
Run for a seat on the Board of Directors.
Participate in the Program Development Committee.
Participate in the Event Committee.

services.title: Influence
subservices: Influence policy inputs.
Influence how CIC adapts its policies to changing conditions and government perspectives.
